CustomField.formula: IF(Hide_Article_Received__c >=1 , IMAGE("/resource/SSSWIcons/Lock.png", "red", 25,25)+' Stop! Do not disclose or confirm any article information to customers. Security Issue.' ,'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Security Reasons, if flag is RED. DO NOT Disclose any information related
CustomField.label: Disclaimer
